content: अनुषंज् (°संज्) {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> To adhere or cling to, follow closely. {%--<ab>pass.</ab>%} (--षज्यते) {@--1@} To stick, cling, adhere to, be attached to (<ab>fig.</ab> also); धर्मपूते च मनसि नभसीव न जातु रजोऽनुषज्यते <ls>Dk. 43</ls>; sometimes occurring as अनुषज्जते (from सस्ज् also); यदा हि नोंद्रियार्थेषु न कर्मस्वनुषज्जते <ls>Bg. 6. 4</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">18. 10.</ls> {@--2@} To be supplied from a preceding rule or statement. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To fasten or attach (something) to. {@--2@} To supply (as an elliptical expression); इति पदमत्रानुषंजनीयं.
